name: Auto Sticky Post
author: LIJE

sections.description:
Developed by www.lije-creative.com, this module will automatically stick a defined number of posts (default blog post) to the homepage. It will update itself if you add, remove, edit a post or change your permalink structure or update your categories.
It is particularly useful since the new Twenty Fourteen WordPress theme promote the ‘sticked blog posts’.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the file content into the /wp-content/plugins/auto-sticky-post directory.
  2. Activate the Auto Sticky Post plugin in the Plugins menu. It may take several seconds.
  3. After the plugin is activated, you will find Auto Sticky Post Menu in the Settings Admin Panel.
  4. Add the number of posts your want to be sticked (usually 3). Et voila!
sections.faq: Feel free to ask me anything on the support.

short_description: Easy Sticky Post is a plugin that stick your last 'n' blog posts to the homepage.
